Index » Quick Start »

Terms Used

Term Definition
Include A snippet that is injected into another page.
Partial See Include
Dynamic Include An include file that is generated at compile time. Often by hooks, or internally by the compiler.
Compile settings Metadata added to a file in your source directory called outline.merge.json, which controls the compile process.
